msg.vswap.hold_ship.failed.by_tp_nonnull: The ship is controlled by a block or other player.
msg.vswap.hold_ship.failed.by_no_holdabl: The ship have no hold pivot. Try to use VsWapWand on this ship.
msg.vswap.hold_ship.failed.by_has_constr: The ship has at least one constraint, thus you can't hold it.'
msg.vswap.hold_ship.drop.by_has_item_in_: The holden ship is dropped because you are holding a item in hand.
msg.vswap.green_print.has_already_ship_d: The greenPrint has already recorded a ship.
It takes 8 traditional sail blocks to start a Windmill Bearing.
One Carbon Fiber Sail is equals to 4 sail blocks.
vswap.ponder.industry/gp_projector_basic: Use empty GreenPrint on VS Projector, a ship with Projection Center will arise.
You can start building your ship from Projection Center.
You can scale the ship by interacting with ProjectorLen
You can also raise or lower the Projection Ship by interacting with value box in sides of Vs Projector
vswap.ponder.industry/gp_use_on_ship.tex: Use GreenPrint on a ship, the ship can be saved.
Use GreenPrint on VS Projector, it will make a Projection Ship, same to the ship saved by GreenPrint.
vswap.ponder.artillery/artillery_assembl: You can use any Phys Bearing to control the artillery
vswap.ponder.artillery/artillery_docker_: There is multiply ways to load a artillery
You can use Holdable VS Ship or Docker to load the artillery
The projectile part will fly away
The remain shell will be ejected
vswap.ponder.artillery/artillery_arm_loa: You can also load with Mechanical Arm
vswap.ponder.artillery/artillery_phys_lo: You can also load with Any Phys Piston
vswap.ponder.munition/primer_general.tex: Basic Primer propels the projectile by gunpowder gas.
Torpedo Primer keep whole munition and fired at low velocity
Rocket Booster keep whole munition and fired at mid velocity, starting boosting after reaching max height
vswap.ponder.munition/munition_structure: There must be a Primer at the bottom of a munition
You can customize your munition with Munition Attach
The Fuze or AP warhead must be at the top of a munition to function
vswap.ponder.munition/munition_ap.text_1: AP's terminal effect is decided by warhead and kinetic energy
vswap.ponder.munition/munition_ap.text_2: APFSDS has high Penetration Ratio and low Destruction Factor
vswap.ponder.munition/munition_ap.text_3: Thus it's able to penetrate long distances, but causes less area of destruction
vswap.ponder.munition/munition_ap.text_4: APCR has mid Penetration Ratio and mid Destruction Factor
vswap.ponder.munition/munition_ap.text_5: Thus APCR penetrates a certain distance while inflicting a certain amount of damage
vswap.ponder.munition/munition_ap.text_6: Blocks can also be used as AP warhead, with low Penetration Ratio and high Destruction Factor
vswap.ponder.munition/munition_ap.text_7: Animation is for reference only, please refer to the actual effect
vswap.ponder.munition/munition_glider.te: Projectile effect by gravity during flight
Glider will expand the wings and start gliding when reaching max height
vswap.ponder.munition/munition_tf.text_1: Projectile effect by air drag during flight
vswap.ponder.munition/munition_tf.text_3: With Fin Tail, wind drag is greatly decreased, which make projectile stable
vswap.ponder.dock/dock_usage.text_1: Hold Ship or Docker to place ship on Dock
vswap.ponder.dock/dock_usage.text_2: Right click a Docker with empty hands to fetch the Ship on it
vswap.ponder.dock/dock_usage.text_3: Mechanical Arm can place Ship to Dock
vswap.ponder.dock/dock_usage.text_4: And it can also fetch Ship from Dock
vswap.ponder.dock/dock_usage.text_5: When Ship's bottom size is larger than Dock's size...
vswap.ponder.dock/dock_usage.text_6: You can expand Dock, default max size is 16*16
vswap.ponder.dock/dock_usage.text_7: The connected rect Docks are considered as one Multiblock Structure.
vswap.ponder.dock/dock_constraint.text_1: The Ship placed on Dock will be constrained
vswap.ponder.dock/dock_constraint.text_2: When Dock attempt to from a Multiblock Structure, the Ship placed on Dock will be unlocked.
vswap.ponder.dock/dock_construct.text_1: You can use Dock to assemble Ships
vswap.ponder.dock/dock_construct.text_2: To assemble ship on a dock, there must be a Dock GreenPrint Holder in it
vswap.ponder.dock/dock_construct.text_3: Dock can't assemble Ships that have large size that Dock Multiblock Structure
vswap.ponder.dock/dock_construct.text_4: If there is any valid GreenPrint, Mechanical Arm will start to work
vswap.ponder.dock/dock_construct.text_5: Mechanical Arm will use Material to place the corresponding block
vswap.ponder.dock/dock_construct.text_6: When the construction is completed, Dock Construction Detector will emit redstone signal
vswap.ponder.dock/dock_construct.text_7: When Dock Unlocked Detector receive redstone signal, the constructed Ship will be unlocked
vswap.ponder.dock/dock_construct.text_8: Next construction will be start as there is no Ship above the Dock Multiblock Structure
vswap.ponder.docker/docker_usage.text_1: Right click with Docker to place Ship
vswap.ponder.docker/docker_usage.text_2: Alt to switch to Block Place Mode(Only when scale is 1.0)
vswap.ponder.docker/docker_usage.text_3: Deployer can also use Docker to place ship
vswap.ponder.docker/docker_usage.text_4: Most blocks in this mod that can interact with ships can also interact docker
